title: Distributive Property
text: The first step is to use the distributive property. $$\left(x+4\right) \left(3x-2y+5\right)$$ $$=$$ $$x\left(3x-2y+5\right)+4\left(3x-2y+5\right)$$
speech: The first step is to use the distributive property. ; open paren x plus 4, close paren; times; open paren, 3 x minus 2 y plus 5; close paren;  ; is equal to;  ; x; open paren, 3 x minus 2 y plus 5; close paren; plus; 4 times; open paren, 3 x minus 2 y plus 5; close paren;

title: Multiply
text: The next step is to multiply those terms. $$x\left(3x-2y+5\right)+4\left(3x-2y+5\right)$$ $$=$$ $$3x^2-2xy+5x+12x-8y+20$$
speech: The next step is to multiply those terms. ; x; open paren, 3 x minus 2 y plus 5; close paren; plus; 4 times; open paren, 3 x minus 2 y plus 5; close paren;  ; is equal to;   3 x squared, minus 2 x y, plus 5 x plus 12 x minus 8 y plus 20;

title: Combining Like Terms
text: After you multiply, in order to simplify, you need to combine like terms. $$3x^2-2xy+5x+12x-8y+20$$ $$=$$ $$3x^2-2xy+5x+12x-8y+20$$
speech: After you multiply, in order to simplify, you need to combine like terms. ; 3 x squared, minus 2 x y, plus 5 x plus 12 x minus 8 y plus 20  ; is equal to;   3 x squared, minus 2 x y, plus 5 x plus 12 x minus 8 y plus 20;

title: Simplifying
speech: Finally, you need to simplify. ; 3 x squared, minus 2 x y, plus 5 x plus 12 x minus 8 y plus 20  ; is equal to;   3 x squared, minus 2 x y, plus 17 x minus 8 y plus 20;
